snippet: Atlanta Hawks General Manager Danny Ferry, under fire for making racially charged remarks, has taken an indefinite leave of absence, the NBA team said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Hawks General Manager Takes Leave of Absence After Making Racial Comments
